location.name: Flying1
location.label: lander_vel_x' == x_acc() && lander_vel_y' == y_acc() && lander_angle_vel' == ang_acc() && lander_pos_x' == x_vel() && lander_pos_y' == y_vel() && lander_angle' == ang_vel() && cost_shape' == cost_maerke()

location.name: Ground
location.label: lander_vel_x' == 0 && lander_vel_y' == 0 && lander_angle_vel' == 0 && lander_pos_x' == 0 && lander_pos_y' == 0 && lander_angle' == 0

location.name: Terminated
location.label: cost_shape' == 0 && lander_vel_x' == 0 && lander_vel_y' == 0 && lander_angle_vel' == 0 && lander_pos_x' == 0 && lander_pos_y' == 0 && lander_angle' == 0

query.formula: strategy win = minE(cost_shape)[<=800] {} -> {main_on, left_on, right_on, lander_pos_x, cost_shape, lander_pos_y, lander_vel_x, lander_vel_y, lander_angle, lander_angle_vel, touch, globalState[0], globalState[1],globalState[2],globalState[3],globalState[4],globalState[5]}: <> LunarLander.Terminated
